actions.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to require the FBI to confirm receipt when a political committee issues a notification that they have been contacted by a reportable foreign contact. Additionally, requires the FBI to submit a report to Congress on how they are managing and responding to notifications from political committees.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to require the FBI to confirm receipt when a political committee issues a notification that they have been contacted by a reportable foreign contact. Additionally, requires the FBI to submit a report to Congress on how they are managing and responding to notifications from political committees.
